label: Preponderance of the Great
i_ching_name: Da Guo / Preponderance of the Great

shadow.name: PURPOSELESSNESS
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Preponderance of the Great, expressing through purposelessness

gift.name: TOTALITY
gift.description: The gift frequency of Preponderance of the Great, expressing through totality

siddhi.name: IMMORTALITY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Preponderance of the Great, expressing through immortality

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 28 shadow frequency. The purposelessness you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural totality. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from purposelessness to totality.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your spleen. Notice the sensation of purposelessness.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 28 consciously for 7 days, the purposelessness pattern will shift toward totality.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 28 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from purposelessness toward totality
